articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: OnePlus’ new ‘small’ phone isn’t coming to the US, but its AI features are - The Verge
articles.description: The India-only OnePlus 13S is launching with Plus Mind, which allows users to automatically save information to a dedicated “Mind Space.”
articles.content:
Plus Mind and other AI tools are coming to the OnePlus 13 series worldwide.
